docs.title: Personal Information
docs.text:
Introduction

Name : Roni Setiawan Address : Bojong Gede District, Bogor Regency, West Java, Indonesia 16920

docs.title: Profesional Summary
docs.text:
I am passionate about Programming since High School when I joined the Informatics Olympiad Team. While learning to code I found joy and excitement.

My career started in 2017, I have been involved in Frontend Engineer, Backend Engineer, DevOps Engineer, and Test Automation Engineer.

As engineer have made me so familiar with solving unpredictable problem, adapting in a new environment, working in a team and learning something new autodidactly. This makes me constantly learning and evolving.

docs.title: Education
docs.text: Bachelor Degree in Computer Science Universitas Lampung, Indoneisa 2012-2016

docs.title: PT Bajau Escorindo, South Jakarta
docs.text:
"PT Bajau Escorindo with purpose to deliver cost effective, optimize and high performance Open Source software solutions to Enterprise organization in Indonesia. Bajau is able to remove the complexity to propose, running and manage IT infrastructure using Open Source Solution."

1. Test Automation Engineer April 2020 - Present

Duties as Test Automation Engineer:

  • Creating automation script based on scenario requested by client.
  • Testing compatibility on Desktop, Mobile, & Cloud Testing.
  • Perform functionality test with related features.
  • Provide information if found bugs, defects, and kind of to client.
  • Provide testing report according client’s format.
  • Maintain and manage all source code testing related to SCM.
  • Support Marketing Team by making Demo Project based on client requirements.
2. Software Developer & DevOps Engineer January 2019 - April 2020

Duties as Software Developer:

  • Creating an application to support Techinal Team for monthly reporting on several Linux Servers owned by client.
  • Support Marketing Team by making design (mock-up), architecture technology and documents related for Demo Project to clients.
  • Creating Web Application based on Company's Project.
  • Maintain and manage all source code application related to SCM.
  • Application related additions features and bug fixes.
  • Reporting status of project aplication to Kanban/ProofHub.
  • Setting up and managing virtual mechine related to application used.
  • Deploy application into target server / virtual mechine.

Duties as DevOps Engineer:

  • Setting up and managing CI Tools.
  • Setting up and managing repository integrated with CICD.
  • Creating pipeline script to running flow process based on application-build.
  • Packaging and versioning result running into archived file (this archived file will be called as artifacts).
  • Uploading artifacts into Repository Manager.
  • Creating playbook script for deployment process into target server.
  • Maintain and manage all script related to SCM
  • Collaborate with cross teams for Demo Project to clients.

docs.title: PT Versa Technology, South Jakarta
docs.text:
"PT Versa Technology is an information technology focused company. We are putting ourself apart from our competitors by providing information technology innovative as prerequisite for good technology goverments."

1. Software Developer March 2017 – January 2019

Duties as Software Developer:

  • Creating Web Application & Android Application according to bussiness requirement.
  • Maintain and manage source code to Source Code Management.
  • Application related addition features and bug fixes.
  • Reporting status of project aplication to JIRA.
  • Handling domain requests for SSL/HTTPS Certificates.
  • Configure web server for client.

docs.title: 1. ATRIS (Advance Transaction Interface System)
docs.text:
Company : PT Versa Tiket Abadi Technology : Source Code Management (SCM) : BitBucket Frontend : NodeJS, VueJS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript Backend : Zend Framework, PHP Database & Web Server : MySQL, IIS Android : Ionic Framework Duration : January 2018 – January 2019

ATRIS is multi business system for reservations & payments.

ATRIS Web Application ATRIS Android Application

docs.title: 2. Sosreport Application
docs.text:
Company : PT Bajau Escorindo Technology : Source Code Management (SCM) : GitLab Frontend : NodeJS, VueJS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript Backend : Flask, Python Database & Web Server : MongoDB, Apache Other Tools : sosreport, sysstat, SAR Chart Duration : January 2019 – May 2019

Generating document Monthly Report for Linux Server (Ubuntu, Centos, RedHat, SUSE, Almalinux) about Performance (CPU, Memory, Disk) & OS Specification (IP Address,MAC, Processor, OS, Kernel). Total around 200 Server Linux.

docs.title: 3. OS Hardening - Telkomsel
docs.text:
Company : Telkomsel Technology : Source Code Management (SCM) : GitLab Hardening Script : Bash Deployment Tools (CD) : Ansible, YAML Repository Manager : JFrog Artifactory Other Tools : OpenSCAP Duration : January 2019 – December 2020

Hardening around 150 VM Server (RedHat) based on status fail. Result every server store as artifact into JFrog Artifactory.

docs.title: 4. CICD Telkomsel Phase 2
docs.text:
Company : Telkomsel Technology : Source Code Management (SCM) : GitLab Continues Inegration (CI) : Jenkins, Groovy, Bash Deployment Tools (CD) : Ansible, YAML Repository Manager : JFrog Artifactory Other Tools : OpenSCAP Duration : January 2019 – December 2020

Migrating source code application into GitLab (On Promise - Telkomsel). Onboarding around 13 important application owned by Telkomsel with CICD.

docs.title: 5. CCAI Reporting Tools
docs.text:
Company : Coca Cola Amatil Indonesia Technology : Source Code Management (SCM) : GitLab Web Application : NodeJS, Laravel, HTML, CSS, JavaScript Database & Web Server : MariaDB, Apache Caching Tools : Redis Other Tools : Qualys, Patch Manager Plus, Bash Duration : January 2020 – December 2021

Hardening & Patching around 250 Server (RedHat, SUSE, Centos, Ubuntu & Windows) based on status fail. Qualys (Scanning/Scurity Assesment, on both server Linux & Windows), Patch Manager Plus (Patching, on both server Linux & Windows), Bash (Hardening, on server Linux only)

docs.title: 6. Telkomsel Automation Testing
docs.text:
Company : Telkomsel Technology : Source Code Management (SCM) : GitLab Test Automation Script : Maven, Java, Appium, Selenium Testing Framework : TestNG Cloud Testing : SeeTest Duration : April 2020 – Present

Creating testing script on FUT, Inspection and Regression for MyTelkomsel Application both Android & iOS. And 3rd application related (Ex: MAXStream, Dunia Games, Viu, Prime Video Mobile, etc)

docs.title: 7. Pengadaan Software Tools Automation Testing Framework Bank Raya
docs.text:
Company : PT Bank Raya Indonesia Tbk Technology : Source Code Management (SCM) : GitLab Test Automation Script : Python, Appium, Selenium Testing Framework : Robot Framework Cloud Testing : Lambdatest Software Management Testing : Testmo Duration : May 2023 – Present

Creating demo project automation testing about Bank Raya Application with CICD (integration with Lambdatest & Tesmo)

docs.title: Technical Skills
docs.text:
• Programming Languages: PHP, Python, Java, Groovy, YAML, Bash
  • Web Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  • Frontend Frameworks: CodeIgniter, Laravel, VueJS, AngularJS, NodeJS
  • Backend Frameworks: Zend Framework, Django, Flask
  • Android Framework: Ionic Framework (Hybrid Mobile App Development)
  • Databases: MySQL, MariaDB, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
  • Caching Tools: Redis
  • Management Project: Jira, Kanban, ProofHub
  • Containerization: Docker
  • CI/CD Tools: Jenkins, GitLab CI, Ansible
  • Web Server: Apache, IIS, NginX
  • Repository Manager: JFrog Artifacory, NEXUS Repository
  • Test Automation: Selenium, Appium
  • Automation Frameworks: TestNG, Robot Framework
  • Cloud Testing: SeeTest, Lambdatest
  • Software Management Testing: Testmo
  • Version Control: Git
  • Tools & Technologies: RESTful API
